answers.answer: Due Oct 11th, first baby, unknown gender :-) I am tired, but can't get comfortable to sleep, super sore in my pelvic area, but not complaining! Was told I can't have babies 20years ago (I am 39) so this is a blessing and miracle!

Congratulations! I'm 35 & my husband & I struggled to get pregnant. After our miscarriage, we thought it wouldn't happen for us, but nope! To our surprise, we were pregnant & I truly feel this baby is a blessing.
I'm due October 2 also I'm feeling a lot of pelvic pain and pressure so ready to meet my princess
I'm due oct 11th getting bh but I'm feeling the the baby is sitting really high I would of though he would be dropped down In my pelvic area but not at all don't know why!

I am due Oct 2 also with a boy. I can't wait.i have been sick for the last ten days with bronchitis and a pulled muscle from all the coughing. I am hoping it will heal before delivery but it makes sleeping more difficult than it already is.... I have also felt some Braxton hicks contractions.
Oct 1 and the same :/

This is exciting! I haven't met other women with due dates close to mine. They have always been late October. Its nice to know that I'm not the only one feeling pelvic pain at this stage. I was getting worried thinking my baby would be premature as my doctor didn't want me delivering before 36 weeks.

Hi ladies..I am due 2nd Oct too ;) just started to get pelvic pains too,like periods pains..I have had a cervix stitch put in at 22weeks as my cervix was opening..very sceary time as this is our first baby me and my hubby been try for 12 years so she is a miracle to us...thank god its worked!!! Going to have it removed on 10th Sept so she could come early ;) wish u all lots luck  ladies  x
Im due october 7 and i have pelvic pains sometimes, at times their light other times its painful. I also have pain on both hands due to swelling, is that normal?
I'm due October 24th with my second.

I've had swelling in both hands too, but not experiencing any pain in my hands. It started about week or so ago and I can no longer wear my wedding ring. Just watch your feet, face & neck. If you notice sudden swelling in those areas, call your doctor right away as it could be a sign of preeclampsia or something else.
Im due October 22 and I've had pain in lower back pelvic area cant sleep and been very emotional and cryin alot...,,hope it goes away when baby gets here

I'm due Oct 18th, I have two girls and one angel baby boy. My last was lost late (at almost 20 weeks) and I got pregnant again soon after. I feel like I've been pregnant for two years!! My pains started at 18 weeks this time, and I'm hurting all the time:( I want to be done being pregnant but I'm not ready for this baby yet! @Keenansmommy yes the pain in the wrist is from the swelling, pressure on the nerves and ligaments,  it's normal. Add it to the list of weird pregnancy symptoms!

Im due October 29th with our first. We're having a little boy :) ive been feeling pretty good, i pass out every night and sleep pretty deeply through the night which is nice after not sleeping well for awhile. No braxton hicks yet, ocasional pain in my pelvis and back. Im pretty tired through the day, usually by afternoon im ready to nap. Im so glad to see other mommies due in october, i cant believe its right around the corner!
October 31st is my due date and Im ready!
So many October Mommies!
Oct 21 an so ready Cuz idk d baby gender.....

Ftm with baby boy.  I'm due on October 8.  Some days I wake up very sore from my pelvic area making it hard to get around.  No pain just a little pressure. I'm ready to have my baby,  but whenever he's I'll be waiting anxiously!

Oct 19th first time mom ..baby has been kicking alot ,moving around, hiccups, pelvic pains and back pains too, been very moody and emotional now .craving food now .i am having a baby girl .cant barley sleep at night .also been having cramping pains,n some light white discharged sometimes. Belly dropped today. Excited n scared .single mom ..
I'm due October 27th with my third boy, I have a 12 and 15 year. I starting to feel tired :( nights are the hardest haven't been able to get a good sleep for about 3 weeks now.

question: Do we have any October Mommies? I'm due October 2nd with my first baby. Been having pelvic pain & braxton hicks contractions. When are you due & how are you feeling?
title: October Mommies
